Owlhawk:  I don't know what those are, but if you mean
shielding our ship has that already.

> Katya: You have a good point, but I was referring to
> some sphere ruins 
> or something like that.
>

> wrote:
> > Owlhawk:  Deposits in this area?  This whole
> planet is
> > coded in a field of energon radiation so strong
> > prolonged exposure results in slagging.  We can't
> just
> > change it in one area.....well as I recall the Vok
> did
